raw: * Decorator which uses the CSS3 border image properties.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Decorator which uses the CSS3 border image properties.

raw: * Base image URL.
* The top slice line of the base image. The slice properties divide the
* image into nine regions, which define the corner, edge and the center
* images.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The top slice line of the base image. The slice properties divide the image into nine regions, which define the corner, edge and the center images.

raw: * The slice properties divide the image into nine regions, which define the
* corner, edge and the center images.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The slice properties divide the image into nine regions, which define the corner, edge and the center images.

raw: * This property specifies how the images for the sides and the middle part
* of the border image are scaled and tiled horizontally.
* Values have the following meanings:
* <ul>

*
  • stretch: The image is stretched to fill the area.

*
  • repeat: The image is tiled (repeated) to fill the area.

*
  • round: The image is tiled (repeated) to fill the area. If it does not
*    fill the area with a whole number of tiles, the image is rescaled so
* that it does.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
This property specifies how the images for the sides and the middle part of the border image are scaled and tiled horizontally. Values have the following meanings:

  • stretch: The image is stretched to fill the area.
  • repeat: The image is tiled (repeated) to fill the area.
  • round: The image is tiled (repeated) to fill the area. If it does not fill the area with a whole number of tiles, the image is rescaled so that it does.

raw: * This property specifies how the images for the sides and the middle part
* of the border image are scaled and tiled vertically.
* Values have the following meanings:
* <ul>

*
  • stretch: The image is stretched to fill the area.

*
  • repeat: The image is tiled (repeated) to fill the area.

*
  • round: The image is tiled (repeated) to fill the area. If it does not
*    fill the area with a whole number of tiles, the image is rescaled so
* that it does.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
This property specifies how the images for the sides and the middle part of the border image are scaled and tiled vertically. Values have the following meanings:

  • stretch: The image is stretched to fill the area.
  • repeat: The image is tiled (repeated) to fill the area.
  • round: The image is tiled (repeated) to fill the area. If it does not fill the area with a whole number of tiles, the image is rescaled so that it does.

raw: * This property specifies how the images for the sides and the middle part
* of the border image are scaled and tiled.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This property specifies how the images for the sides and the middle part of the border image are scaled and tiled.

raw: * If set to false, the center image will be omitted and only
* the border will be drawn.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: If set to false, the center image will be omitted and only the border will be drawn.

raw: * Configures the border image mode. Supported values:
* <ul>

*
  • horizontal: left and right border images

*
  • vertical: top and bottom border images

*
  • grid: border images for all edges

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Configures the border image mode. Supported values:

  • horizontal: left and right border images
  • vertical: top and bottom border images
  • grid: border images for all edges

raw: * Adds the border-image styles to the given map
* @param styles {Map} CSS style map

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds the border-image styles to the given map

raw: * Computes the inset values based on the border image slices (defined in the
* decoration theme or computed from the fallback image sizes).
* @return {Map} Map with the top, right, bottom and left insets

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Computes the inset values based on the border image slices (defined in the decoration theme or computed from the fallback image sizes).

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} Map with the top, right, bottom and left insets
@return.description: Map with the top, right, bottom and left insets

raw: * Gets the slice sizes from the fallback border images.
* @param baseImage {String} Resource Id of the base border image
* @return {Integer[]} Array with the top, right, bottom and left slice widths

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the slice sizes from the fallback border images.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: baseImage {String} Resource Id of the base border image
@param.description: Resource Id of the base border image

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer[]} Array with the top, right, bottom and left slice widths
@return.description: Array with the top, right, bottom and left slice widths
